320560.name: Fantasy Grounds - Deadlands Noir: The Case of the Jumbo Shrimp
320560.description:
Savage Worlds Adventure for Fantasy Grounds
A missing persons case turns into a diabolical tale of greed, murder, magic, and mayhem in the ever-mysterious Crescent City. This time the gumshoes are in it deep, crossing paths with the Black Hand, corrupt politicians (are there any other kind?), and secrets as old as the Big Easy itself.
This module was converted directly from the full-length 46 page adventure and features plenty of action and investigation for Deadlands Noir. It was written by Jason Murderin Mical and John Prawn Finger Goff.
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software, the Savage Worlds
Ruleset and the Deadlands Noir Setting for Fantasy Grounds
Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Ben Turner
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Ben Turner
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Savage Worlds Adventure Edition ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
